sentences.en: Avoid unhealthy foods such as hamburger and chips.
sentences.cn: 不要吃不健康食品，如汉堡和薯条。
走后门是一种不正之风.

sentences.en: Eye problems can indicate an unhealthy lifestyle with subsequent suppression of the immune system.
sentences.cn: 患眼疾可能表明生活方式不健康，而且免疫系统同时受到抑制。

sentences.en: Frank has developed what I would term an unhealthy relationship with these people.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克与这些人的关系在我看来不正常。

sentences.en: Her cheeks had an unhealthy pallor.
His face took on an unhealthy whitish hue.
sentences.cn: 他的脸上透出一丝病态的苍白。

sentences.en: His skin had an unhealthy greyish tinge.
sentences.cn: 他的皮肤有种不健康的淡灰色。

sentences.en: Our rows become unhealthy in the extreme.
sentences.cn: 我们的争吵变得极其有害。

sentences.en: Rejecting Vice Admiral Halsey to his face was an unhealthy undertaking.
sentences.cn: 当面回绝海尔赛海军中将的做法不太好.

sentences.en: That book is unhealthy for a child.
sentences.cn: 那本书很不健康，不适宜孩子阅读。

sentences.en: The doctor examined the child and said she was unhealthy.
sentences.cn: 医生检查了孩子后说她并不健康.

sentences.en: The redundancy of skilled and experienced workers is a terrible waste and a clear sign of an unhealthy economy.
sentences.cn: 技术熟练、经验丰富的工人过剩是可怕的浪费，也是经济运行不良的明显征兆。

sentences.en: They looked pale and unhealthy, with unwashed hair and sunken cheeks.
sentences.cn: 他们脸色苍白，精神不振，头发脏乱，两颊深陷。
不利于健康的生活环境

words.tran_cn: 对身体有害的；不卫生的；影响健康的

trans.tran_cn: 不健康的，对健康有害的，危险的，反常的
